actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit amounts in State unemployment funds to be used to provide self-employment allowances.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit amounts in State unemployment funds to be used to provide cash benefits to an individual who is establishing a business as a self-employed individual.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit amounts in State unemployment funds to be used to provide self-employment allowances.
